data.controller_manager_config.yaml:
apiVersion: config.k8ssandra.io/v1beta1
kind: OperatorConfig
metadata:
  name: operator-config
health:
  healthProbeBindAddress: :8081
metrics:
  bindAddress: 127.0.0.1:8080
webhook:
  port: 9443
leaderElection:
  leaderElect: true
  resourceName: b569adb7.cassandra.datastax.com
disableWebhooks: false
imageConfigFile: /configs/image_config.yaml
data.image_config.yaml:
apiVersion: config.k8ssandra.io/v1beta1
kind: ImageConfig
metadata:
  name: image-config
images:
  system-logger: "k8ssandra/system-logger:v1.10.3"
  config-builder: "datastax/cass-config-builder:1.0.4-ubi7"
  # cassandra:
  #   "4.0.0": "k8ssandra/cassandra-ubi:latest"
  # dse:
  #   "6.8.999": "datastax/dse-server-prototype:latest"
# imageRegistry: "localhost:5000"
# imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
# imagePullSecret:
#   name: my-secret-pull-registry
defaults:
  # Note, postfix is ignored if repository is not set
  cassandra:
    repository: "k8ssandra/cass-management-api"
  dse:
    repository: "datastax/dse-server"
    suffix: "-ubi7"

data.controller_manager_config.yaml:
apiVersion: config.k8ssandra.io/v1beta1
kind: OperatorConfig
metadata:
  name: operator-config
health:
  healthProbeBindAddress: :8081
metrics:
  bindAddress: 127.0.0.1:8080
webhook:
  port: 9443
leaderElection:
  leaderElect: true
  resourceName: b569adb7.cassandra.datastax.com
disableWebhooks: false
imageConfigFile: /configs/image_config.yaml
data.image_config.yaml:
apiVersion: config.k8ssandra.io/v1beta1

images:
  system-logger: "k8ssandra/system-logger:v1.10.3"

# imageRegistry: "localhost:5000"
# imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
# imagePullSecret:
#   name: my-secret-pull-registry
defaults:
  # Note, postfix is ignored if repository is not set
  cassandra:
    repository: "k8ssandra/cass-management-api"
  dse:
    repository: "datastax/dse-server"
    suffix: "-ubi7"
